attributes.action: Allow the non vulnerable and non shielding population to return to normality
attributes.additional_details:
The expectation of a second national lockdown is already igniting fear and anxiety in a large majority of the population. Other countries such as Sweden and New Zealand have effectively handled this pandemic and are now returning to normality. 

The government cannot provide a substantial or scientific reason why healthy individuals shouldn't continue to live life as normal whilst still shielding the vulnerable. Cutting off the economy now will just cause further devastation.
attributes.background: The pandemic has had a hugely detrimental effect on the mental health of the majority of the population; a second lockdown will exacerbate this. Allow people without pre-existing health conditions to continue to experience normality in a socially distanced way and shield the vulnerable.
